profileAlternative.name: Yimei (Liz) Chen
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Facebook
profileAlternative.summary:
Data Scientist with experience in product development, marketing experiment, and go-to-market strategy. Passionate to wrestle with complex data and apply data insights to tell stories and solve business problems.

Programming: Python (sklearn, XGBoost, pandas, numpy, matplotlib), R, SQL
Distributed Computing: AWS (EC2, S3, EMR), Spark (Spark SQL, Spark ML)
Database and Visualization: Postgres, MongoDB, Tableau, shiny, ggplot, matplotlib
Language: English, Chinese

aboutAlternative.text:
Data Scientist with experience in product development, marketing experiment, and go-to-market strategy. Passionate to wrestle with complex data and apply data insights to tell stories and solve business problems.

Programming: Python (sklearn, XGBoost, pandas, numpy, matplotlib), R, SQL

educations.title: University of San Francisco
educations.degree: Master of Science in Data Science

given.text: I directly worked with Liz on Dynamic Pricing project during her internship at Wiser Solutions, Inc. We worked on predictive modeling algorithms extensively for months. She demonstrated great independent researching and implementation ability and applied state-of-art machine learning techniques to solve real world problems with business insights. Her fast-learning capability, strong curiosity and business acumen made her a great asset to the team. Her humorous personality and great communication skills also made the work experience fun and productive. See less

items: Bay Area Bike Share Daily Demand Prediction
Use Time Series to Predict Canadian Bankruptcy Rate

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Quantitative Research Associate at J.P. Morgan
Head of Data Science at Airbnb (We're hiring!)
Investment Banking Associate at Goldman Sachs
